solution.text:
Area of the polygon = Area of square (1) + Area of triangle (2) + Area of square (3)
\(= (a \times b) + (\frac 12 \times e \times d) + (b-d) \times e\)
\(= _{{j**2}}_ + _{{Decimal('0.5')*(Decimal('0.5')*j)*(Decimal('0.5')*j)}}_ + _{{(j-(Decimal('0.5')*j))*(Decimal('0.5')*j)}}_\)
= \(_{{(j**2)+(Decimal('0.5')*(j*Decimal('0.5'))*(j*Decimal('0.5')))+((Decimal('0.5')*j)**2)}}_ cm^2\)
